properties.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 8:22AM AKST until January 28 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area including
Yakutat.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snowfall rates may
be locally heavy for a few hours late this morning and this
afternoon. Wet snow will be difficult to manage.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING FOR THE YAKUTAT AREA
